/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. A blue car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a pop of color to the otherwise green landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The image appears to have been captured during the day, as evidenced by the bright and vibrant colors.
